bugs.description: In parser.popContext(), after slicing the context stack to remove the last element, the code unconditionally accesses p.ctxs[len(p.ctxs)-1]. If the stack had only one element before the pop, the slice becomes empty and this access will cause an index-out-of-range panic. The code should check that the slice is non-empty before accessing, or set p.ctx to nil when the stack becomes empty.
